Election Security 🗳️🔒

Jun 12, 2019

  • civictech
  • episode
  • news
  • policy

Our host Ryan Koch presents a short briefing on the topic of Election Security. This includes a discussion on a report released recently by Stanford University, as well as a couple oft forgotten weak links in election infrastructure security.
